thread.title: Flashback: Obama Kicked Reporters Off Plane In 2008 Because He Didn’t Like Their Coverage
thread.title_full: Flashback: Obama Kicked Reporters Off Plane In 2008 Because He Didn’t Like Their Coverage

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: Flashback: Obama Kicked Reporters Off Plane In 2008 Because He Didn’t Like Their Coverage
text:
06:34pm February 27, 2017 Do   
The media has been freaking out, and often times lying, about the way Donald Trump has treated the press. 
They seem to be surprised by the idea that their years of lying about Republicans is finally catching up with them. 
The truth of the matter is that Trump has every right to push back against a mainstream media that has been publishing completely unverified stories to smear him.   
Also, let’s not forget that Obama had issues with the media as well.   
Jake Tapper is all over it…  1'); }); Flashback to 2008: "Obama Campaign Kicks Off the Plane Reporters from Newspapers Whose Coverage it Doesn't Like" https://t.co/4j8bgkfIRJ 
— Jake Tapper (@jaketapper) February 27, 2017 
Gee, that’s weird!
